thread.title: One dead in shooting at US zombie-themed street fest
thread.title_full: One dead in shooting at US zombie-themed street fest | News24

author: news24.com
title: One dead in shooting at US zombie-themed street fest
text:
Miami - A shooting at a zombie-themed street festival in the US state of Florida has left one person dead and four others wounded, reports said on Sunday.
The incident in downtown Fort Myers happened shortly before midnight on Saturday, according to the local NBC affiliate.
The suspect is at large and a man suffering from a gunshot wound died at the scene, NBC2 News reported.
Four others were taken to hospital with injuries described as non-life threatening, it said.
